events.message: I received my new laptop yesterday, but the screen has multiple scratches and the keyboard keys are sticky, which makes it hard to use.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect related to damaged screen and sticky keyboard.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in product defects for further assistance.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the defects on your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the keyboard, as well as the laptop serial number?
I have attached clear photos of the damaged screen and the keyboard. The serial number is on the back label: SN123456789.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement laptop shipped immediately or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop since I still want the product but without defects. Please proceed with that option.
I am escalating your request to our returns department to expedite the replacement shipment process.
Your replacement laptop has been shipped and should arrive within 3-5 business days. A return label for the defective unit is included.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and everything is working well now.
Yes, I received the new laptop today and it works perfectly. Thank you for the prompt support.
The support case has been closed following successful replacement delivery and customer confirmation.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the support experience.
